CONJUGATES: thoughtfully | thoughtfulness | more thoughtful | most thoughtful

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Showing consideration for the needs of other people; kind and caring.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 体贴的；关心的；考虑周到的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: It was very thoughtful of you to bring me soup when I was sick.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我生病时你给我带汤来，真是太体贴了。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Engaged in or characterized by deep thought; reflective or pensive.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 沉思的；深思熟虑的；经过仔细考虑的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He looked thoughtful while considering the proposal.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他在考虑这项提议时，看上去若有所思。
